ing: 1 cup ice cubes, or as needed
des: "An adaptation of a similar recipe from one of those chain restaurants. This may be served over the rocks, if desired. Using lemon-lime seltzer instead of lemon-lime soda makes the drink less sweet. Simply refreshing!"
ins:
Mix wine, lemon-lime soda, peach schnapps, and pineapple juice in a cocktail shaker; add ice. Stir until wine mixture is chilled.
Place frozen peach, red grapes, and green grapes in a martini glass; strain wine mixture into martini glass.
